```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ppp <- read_csv("PPP details.csv")
glimpse(ppp)
```

```{r}
ppp <- ppp |>
  select(`Loan amount`, 
         `Amount forgiven`, 
         Payroll, 
         Rent, 
         Utilities, 
         `Health Care`, 
         `Mortgage Interest`, 
         `Debt Interest`, 
         `Refinancing EIDL`, 
         `Business type`, 
         Industry, 
         `Age of business`, 
         `Borrower zip`, 
         `Jobs reported`, 
         Gender, Race) |>
  mutate(Industry = as_factor(Industry),
         `Age of business` = as_factor(`Age of business`),
         `Business type` = as_factor(`Business type`),
         Gender = as_factor(Gender),
         Race = as_factor(Race)) |>
  na.omit()

glimpse(ppp)
```
